head.title: New York, a Nice Place to Visit; More Exciting Skyline

hedline.hl1: New York, a Nice Place to Visit; More Exciting Skyline

abstract.p: David L Hunter letter, commenting on October 16 article, suggests design of Trump World Tower, mammoth residential skyscraper proposed for midtown Manhattan is boring

block.p: The proposed Trump World Tower (front page, Oct. 16) will be the fourth-tallest building in midtown. Why does it have to be so boring? Donald J. Trump is wasting his best opportunity yet for making a statement on the New York skyline. Why can't the proposed monolith have an interesting top similar to its neighbor in the drawing, or to other residential towers like Cityspire or even Trump Palace?
DAVID L. HUNTER New York, Oct. 16, 1998
